mapper.select: select role_name as name from t_sys_role role inner JOIN t_sys_role_user u on role.id=u.role_id INNER JOIN t_sys_admin acc on u.account_id = acc.id where acc.user_name=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select m.url,GROUP_CONCAT(m.name) as name FROM( select res.url,ifnull(role.role_name,'superadmin') as name from ( select menu.url,res.role_id from t_sys_resource menu left JOIN t_sys_role_resource res on menu.id =res.resource_id ) res LEFT JOIN t_sys_role role on res.role_id = role.id) m GROUP BY m.url
